settings.title: SMA Modbus settings
settings.subtitle: Please enter port. Default port is 502.

pair.title: Add SMA Inverter
pair.nosettings: Please fill in all the required fields.
pair.intro: Enter the IP address of your SMA inverter.

pair.title: Add PVOutput account
pair.intro: Enter the API key and system id for your PVOutput account. PVOutput.org will be updated using the interval specified below, between the start and end reporting hours.
